features: [LONG DISTANCE RANGE] If you are upstairs or in the backyard, you won't miss a guest thanks to this wireless doorbell's 1300-foot long-range transmission capacity. This is a superior mini doorbell as an ideal option no wiring but easily set up in home, apartment, classroom, company, hotel, Hospital, shop, workshop and anywhere in house you stay.

[EASY TO INSTALLATION]The wireless doorbell is exceedingly simple to install with stickers included and doesn't require any advanced wiring. You may install a wireless doorbell by your electric drill in your house in a matter of minutes and benefit from its ease and security.

[WEATHER RESISTANT] The remote doorbell button features IP55 waterproof and dustproof that is resistant to the elements due to its waterproof construction. The substance utilized is strong and can withstand adverse weather conditions without losing its functionality.

[ADJUSTABLE 5 VOLUME LEVELS] This doorbell chimes wireless will both flash with adjustable volume from 0 dB (mute mode for sleeping baby) to a maximum volume of 120 dB. You can choose from a variety of volume settings with this wireless home buzzer doorbell to create the ideal tone for your house whether you want a subtle chime or a loud ding.

[32 OPTIONAL MELODIES & 7 FLASH COLORS ] Equipped with a variety of high quality ringtones that play absolute music from classical country to popular. Easy to get relaxed and comfortable with a plug-in wireless doorbell. Bright and colorful LED flashing can help people with hearing impairments.

[ 100% GUARANTEE & SERVICE ] Fanstic wireless doorbell are certified with CE, RoHS, FCC, ETL. You can enjoys 1-year warranty.Backed 30-davs free return and free lifetime technical online support within 24 hours. Please contact us if you have any questions, we will serve you wholeheartedly.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Extended Battery Performance Experience the convenience of a doorbell that lasts longer with a CR2032 lithium battery (replaceable) , boasting an impressive three-year lifespan. Say goodbye to the hassle of constant battery changes, and enjoy the added peace of mind with our support for this enduring doorbell system. Silent Alert Mode Our doorbell comes with a considerate mute function, ensuring that your peace, or that of a sleeping child, remains undisturbed. Even in mute mode, the LED notification system make sure you wont miss a visitor, combining tranquility with awareness. Intuitive Memory Feature Our wireless doorbells have a smart memory feature that retains your selected melodies even after a power outage. This convenient feature ensures that your preferences are preserved, eliminating the need to readjust settings once the power is restored. Enjoy the peace of mind that comes with a ring doorbell that remembers your preferences, providing a consistent experience day after day.

Expansive Wireless Reach Boasting a remarkable 1300-foot wireless range, our doorbells connectivity extends effortlessly across vast spaces. This makes it a versatile solution for not just residential settings like apartments, villas, and large estates, but also for commercial premises including offices, stores, and classrooms. Enhanced Weather-Resistant Construction Our doorbells push button is engineered with an IP55 waterproof rating, surpassing standard doorbells in resilience to withstand rainy conditions. Designed to operate flawlessly in temperatures ranging from -4°F to 140°F, its the ideal choice for diverse climates and environments, whether it be a cozy home or a bustling commercial space. Vibrant Visual Alerts Upon activation, the transmitters colorful indicator illuminates, and the chime receivers colorful LED indicator comes to life. This visual cue is especially beneficial for those with hearing difficulties, making our wireless doorbell an inclusive solution for all, including the elderly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm thoroughly impressed with this wireless doorbell! The unboxing to installation process was a breeze, taking no more than ten minutes, even with the additional step of removing my previous doorbell. Its design is not only appealing but also functional, featuring an illuminated button and a volume control on the plug-in receiver. The convenience of it being plug-in is a standout, eliminating the need for constant battery replacements. An exceptional feature that I particularly enjoy is the variety of chimes and sounds available, providing a customizable experience that rivals even the more costly alternatives I've previously owned. I'm hopeful that its weatherproof qualities hold true as advertised, but as it stands, the value for the price is outstanding, and I'm extremely satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wireless frequency is perfect for 3 stored house
reviews.reviewText: Very fast shipping. Good packaging small size product but works very good. The sound is louder enough and adjustable. Ringtone is good ( strong and soft both). Overall price and quality unbelievable . Comes with remote trigger battery. Plug and play. If you buy you are not gonna be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick and Easy
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a replacement doorbell, and I works great. Installation was a breeze and everything synced up perfectly without me having to do anything. The wall plugs are low profile and look nice and generic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks Great & Works very well, no troubles installing. We really like that it has a variety of ringtones to choose from especially the Christmas ringtone , that was a really nice surprise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Connection is good, loud volume. Love that it comes with tools and adhesives to apply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The price and quality are very important and this product has both
reviews.reviewText: The price was great and the quality so far is excellent. Easy to install. I would recommend this product to anyone that needs a door bell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: Seems to be loud enough. Some of the available tones I doubt anyone will ever use but as long as it has the basics it’s ok with me. Haven’t had it long enough to see if the button is actually made for the outdoor weather in Michigan. Easy to set up and pair everything together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long range connection
reviews.reviewText: My parents use a doorbell system to alert each other when in need of something. The button on this one lights up so my Dad can know that he actually has a response. The two units allow my Mom to rest easy without constantly taking the ringer box with her. I was super pleased with the long distance between one box and the ringer button. They were delighted that both of their needs had been met with one system. Curious to know if I can purchase another ringer button. Excellent product. Stylish display. Would highly recommend if you are in the need for a doorbell system whether for home, school or work.
